mapper.select: select l.lesson_no, l.lesson_title, m.user_id, l.lesson_date, l.lesson_chk, l.pay_state, l.lesson_state from find_lesson l, membership m where l.user_no = m.user_no
select l.lesson_no, l.lesson_title, m.user_id, l.lesson_date from find_lesson l, membership m where l.user_no = m.user_no and l.lesson_chk = 0

select l.lesson_no, l.lesson_title, l.lesson_content, m.user_id, l.lesson_date,lesson_loc, lesson_subject, lesson_price, lesson_age from find_lesson l, membership m where l.user_no = m.user_no and l.lesson_chk = 0 and l.lesson_no = #{no}
